caseStudies.title: Axis Max Life Insurance Limited Reduced CAC by ~10% by Maximizing Ad Efficiency

results: ~10% absolute reduction in CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost) (compare to the traditional client side approach)
Built a robust & futuristic customer-centric capability

backgroundData.title: Background
backgroundData.heading: Axis Max Life Insurance, A leading life insurance company in India
backgroundData.description: Axis Max Life Insurance Limited is an Indian life insurance company based in New Delhi and is the largest private-sector life insurer in India that is not affiliated with a bank.

objectiveData.title: Objective
objectiveData.heading: Reduction in Customer Acquisition Costs (CAC)
objectiveData.description: Axis Max Life Insurance Limited faced rising Customer Acquisition Costs (CAC) due to inefficient ad targeting and tracking limitations. Browser restrictions, privacy regulations, and iOS updates reduced tracking and retargeting capabilities, shrinking their reach. Client-side pixels led to incomplete data, poor attribution, and lower Event Match Quality (EMQ).

solutionData.title: Solution
solutionData.heading: Transitioned from client-side pixel tracking to server-side tracking
description: Transitioned from client-side pixel tracking to server-side tracking via Conversions API (CAPI) using GCP, ensuring resilience against browser restrictions and improving data accuracy.
Integrated hashed user identifiers (emails, phone numbers etc) to protect PII, ensuring compliance with GDPR while maintaining trust and data security.
Enriched events with high-quality identifiers and contextual data to boost EMQ. Monitored EMQ scores and campaign metrics in real-time to ensure optimal results

content.tagline: Axis Max Life Insurance Limited & DWAO Collaboration Achieves 10% increase in their Term & Savings business

resultData.title: Result
resultData.heading: ~10% absolute reduction in CAC
description: ~10% absolute reduction in CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost) (compare to the traditional client side approach).
Transitioned from device/cookie-based identification to user-based identification & built future-proof solution.
Developed a capability that is compliant with PII regulations.

content: The implementation of server-side tracking has been a game changer for our marketing strategy, enhancing data accuracy, ensuring compliance, and driving greater efficiency. By reducing customer acquisition costs for our Term & Savings business and optimizing campaign performance, we’ve been able to expand our reach and engage with our audience more meaningfully. This data-driven transformation has reinforced our brand’s commitment to innovation and customer-centricity, delivering measurable success in our marketing efforts
testimonial.name: Vaibhav Kumar

absoluteStat.description: Absolute reduction in CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost) (compare to the traditional client side approach)
